General.Name: Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited
General.Description: Sahathai Terminal Public Company Limited provides commercial port and logistics services in Thailand. The company is involved in the coastal port, coastal port management consultancy, tugboat, inland transport, and related merchant marine businesses. It also offers on-site container inspection, cleaning, maintenance, repair, and upgradation services; multipurpose terminal services, such as bulk and project cargo, and coastal shipping; warehousing services; and value added logistics services inside the port. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
